name: Z69 (itch)
description:
Genre: platformer
Platform: PC
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
Number of players: one
GameMaker: GMS

Description

Z69 is a minimalistic platformer game in the best traditions of such games as Super Meat Boy, VVVVVV, and Super Mario Bros.

A game for those that love games with increased complexity. Each level is a serious test of your gaming skills and nerves.

Features

  • Minimalist style
  • A palette of five colors
  • So many levels
  • Excellent soundtrack
  • Increased complexity

The demo version of the game is already available – test your strength!
